BR_text.BRsummary: tqdm doesn't work on google colab
BR_text.BRdescription:
<denchmark-h:h3>Bug Description</denchmark-h>
 
 As mentioned by <denchmark-link:https://github.com/shyamalschandra>@shyamalschandra</denchmark-link>
 .
 According to <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tqdm/tqdm/issues/558>tqdm issue#558</denchmark-link>
 
 tqdm.notebook can't work on Google Colab due to the lack of 
 <denchmark-h:h3>Reproducing Steps</denchmark-h>
 
 Steps to reproduce the behavior:
 
 Step 1: pip3 install autokeras on google colab
 Step 2: run example/mnist.py by coping and pasting the code in Google Colab.
 
 <denchmark-h:h3>Expected Behavior</denchmark-h>
 
 Should be working without error
 <denchmark-h:h3>Setup Details</denchmark-h>
 
 Include the details about the versions of:
 
 OS type and version: Google Colab
 Python: 3.6
 autokeras: 0.2.18
 scikit-learn: 0.19.1
 numpy: 1.14.5
 keras: 2.2.2
 scipy:
 tensorflow: 1.10.0
 pytorch: 0.4.1
 tqdm: 4.25.0
 
 <denchmark-h:h3>Additional context</denchmark-h>
 
 Could be solved by replacing
 from tqdm.autonotebook import tqdm
 to
 from tqdm import tqdm
 However, the final progress bar will remain on the terminal

comments_0.comment_text:
Hi, I am a tqdm developer and am trying to address this problem.
 I have a PR which has minimal function <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tqdm/tqdm/pull/640>tqdm/tqdm#640</denchmark-link>
 
 Could you please try it and give me some feedbacks? (eg. If it is enough for you).

comments_1.comment_text:
Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/chengs>@chengs</denchmark-link>
 , thanks for the great work. With the patch, tqdm should be able to support tqdm.notebook on Google Colab, Is my understanding correct?
 I've tried our original usage of tqdm:
 from tqdm.autonotebook import tqdm
 progress_bar = tqdm(total=len(
     desc='Epoch-'
     + str(self.current_epoch)
     + ', Current Metric - '
     + str(self.current_metric_value),
     file=sys.stdout,
     leave=False,
     ncols=100,
     position=0,
     unit=' batch')
 Still I got the same error code.

comments_2.comment_text:
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/tl-yang>@tl-yang</denchmark-link>
  Yes, although it is hard to implement ALL the tqdm features since there is no ipywidgets support, my plan is to implement a ugly but workable progressbar without the support of ipywidgets.
 I will check your case and try to make it work.

comments_3.comment_text:
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/chengs>@chengs</denchmark-link>
  Do you have any update on this?

comments_4.comment_text:
I implement the basic function. Please see the demo here. <denchmark-link:https://colab.research.google.com/drive/12QXaI5ZAiQJfK-19HVl8fyjyh79B-TMf>https://colab.research.google.com/drive/12QXaI5ZAiQJfK-19HVl8fyjyh79B-TMf</denchmark-link>
 
 The PR is waiting for review yet, so I think it may take weeks until my PR is merged into master.

comments_5.comment_text: Is it usable on Colab now?  It seems to mess with it still.
